DOCNAME: CASE OF ANTSIFEROV AND NOVIKOV v. RUSSIA
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 5 - Right to liberty and security (Article 5-4 - Speediness of review)
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants were prosecuted in GPE for crimes . They were arrested and detained while the crimes were investigated and pending trial . Their detention was ordered and extended by the courts . The detention orders were essentially based on the gravity of the charges , the primary grounds being the risk of the applicants’ absconding and interfering with the course of justice . The detention and extension orders used stereotypical formulae , without addressing specific facts or considering alternative preventive measures .
